casebody.data:
(109 App. Div. 917) Ex parte HILL. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. November 29, 1905.) Appeal from Special Term, Kings County. Habeas corpus proceedings by the people on the relation of John Hill. From an order adverse to the petitioner, he appeals. Reversed.

Argued before HIRSCHBERG, P. J„ and WOODWARD, JENKS, RICH, and MIDLER, JJ.

Lockwood & Hill, for petitioner. PER CURIAM.

Order reversed, and petitioner discharged, upon the opinion in People ex rel. Silz v. Hesterberg (decided herewith) 96 N. Y. Supp. 286.

JENKS and MILLER, JJ., dissent.
